title: Korean beef stir fry
ingredients: ['450g beef sirloin steak, thinly sliced', '6 cloves garlic, finely chopped', '1/2 pear, peeled, cored and finely chopped', '2 spring onions, thinly sliced', '4 tablespoons soy sauce', '2 tablespoons caster sugar', '1 tablespoon sesame oil', '1 tablespoon rice wine', '1 tablespoon sesame seeds', '1 teaspoon finely chopped fresh ginger', '1 teaspoon freshly ground black pepper to taste (optional)']
